review: I decided to get rid of my satellite and ordered one of these to use instead.  I'm not sure why I waited to long!  I loved it so much that I ordered a second one to have in my bedroom.  My son enjoys watching shows with it but also loves the fact that he can play video games as well.  I've rarely had issues with it and when I have, it has been issues with my internet and not the stick itself.  I would highly recommend this to everyone!
